data.comment: The match has started.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Goias at Arena do Gremio.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 7, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Souza for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 8, Gremio's Maicon breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Goias a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 9, Gremio drives forward and Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Jean Pyerre (Gremio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
At Arena do Gremio, Gremio are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Gremio throw-in in Goias's half.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Goias.
In the minute 18, Goias to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Gremio pushes forward through Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jean Pyerre scores to make it 1-0 at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 20, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Jean Pyerre (Gremio) strikes at Arena do Gremio but his header is cleared.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows against Gremio's Jean Pyerre for offside.
In the minute 27, Fernandao for the away team is judged to be offside.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Goias at Arena do Gremio.
Goias push forward at Arena do Gremio and Fernandao gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Gremio defence.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 32, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Goias's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gremio are pushing forward but Diogo Barbosa's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, Goias have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 39, Ferreira of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goias have a goal kick.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 40, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Gremio's Ferreira is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Gremio drive upfield and Diego Souza gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goias defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio's Ferreira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Goias at Arena do Gremio.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Goias throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio are coming forward and Jean Pyerre gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Porto Alegre.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goias make their first substitution with Rafael Moura replacing Fernandao.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Keko with Rodrigues. This is the second substitution made today by Augusto Cesar.
Heron is on a sub for Taylon for Goias.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 48, Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
Matheus Henrique (Gremio) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 50, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goias.
David Duarte hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Goias.
In the minute 52, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Gremio a goal kick.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Goias.
In the minute 54, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 58, The match at Arena do Gremio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Diogo Barbosa, who is down injured.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Gremio throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 61, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio's Diogo Barbosa is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 61, Gremio drive into the zone and Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Pepe is replacing Ferreira for the home team.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Porto Alegre Gremio's Diogo Barbosa is caught offside.
Goal! Gremio extend their lead to 2-0 through Maicon.
In the minute 65, Great play from Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos to set up the goal.
Augusto Cesar is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena do Gremio with Joao Marcos replacing Shaylon.
In the minute 68, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Goias.
David Duarte for Goias has been booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Joao Marcos keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Fabio Sanches with an assist there.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Goias.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias.
In Porto Alegre, Joao Marcos of Goias is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 74, Gremio's Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goias have a goal kick.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a second substitution, with Diego Churin replacing Diego Souza.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Maicon with Lucas Silva.
Luis Orejuela is replacing Victor Ferraz for the home team.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 78, Gremio to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Everton is replacing Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 79, Luis Orejuela (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Goias.
Diogo Barbosa of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Miguel Figueira (Goias) gets booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Miguel Figueira with Henrique Lordelo.
Jean Pyerre (Gremio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 85, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Gremio's Diego Churin is whistled for offside at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio's Everton gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gremio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goias.
In the minute 87, Lucas Silva (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Gremio throw-in in Goias's half.
Diego Churin's header is off-target for Gremio.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Goias a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Gremio.
Throw-in Gremio.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Diego Churin of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Goias at Arena do Gremio.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
That's full-time at Arena do Gremio. The final score is 2-1.
Rodrigues (Gremio) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
